Welcome to Mumara App Store, it started after the immense success of the Self-Hosted edition of Mumara Email, largely accepted worldwide.

The admin side of the application puts a valuable data on view for the administrator perusal. It lets you monitor the list of campaigns in the scheduled queue, all existing clients, contacts added by these clients across the lists, sender IDs applied by the clients, list of all custom variables created by the clients and all existing SMS campaigns created through client accounts. Admin can view all.

Application settings and parental controls offer you an ability to administer the application and corresponding functionality from your admin panel. From general application settings to individual module based controls, you have everything setup to enable, limit and control functions according to your business preferences.

Your admin dashboard brings set of important insights for your perusal. It keeps you updated about the gateway activity and gateway remaining balance, top client by different metrics like by SMS count, top countries and networks that your clients are sending to, brief about todayâ€™s activity like todayâ€™s total SMS count, an overview of support and general section.

A backend administrative panel loaded with powerful tools to manage everything from the user interface. Easy to navigate around with properly organized navigational elements. Intuitive processes supported by assistive texts to perform every function conveniently and completely.
